abstract: General Electric reported that its financial arm, which lost billions of dollars and became an albatross for the conglomerate during the financial crisis, posted a profit of $1.7 billion in the second quarter.
snippet: General Electric reported that its financial arm, which lost billions of dollars and became an albatross for the conglomerate during the financial crisis, posted a profit of $1.7 billion in the second quarter.
lead_paragraph: GE Capital has gone from burden to boon.
